00026 // get file ID
00027 $fileID = isset($_GET['fid'])?(integer)$_GET['fid']:0;
00028 // get biblioID
00029 $biblioID = isset($_GET['bid'])?(integer)$_GET['bid']:0;
00030 
00031 // query file to database
00032 $sql_q = 'SELECT att.*, f.* FROM biblio_attachment AS att
00033     LEFT JOIN files AS f ON att.file_id=f.file_id
00034     WHERE att.file_id='.$fileID.' AND att.biblio_id='.$biblioID.' AND att.access_type=\'public\'';
00035 $file_q = $dbs->query($sql_q);
00036 $file_d = $file_q->fetch_assoc();
00037 
00038 if ($file_q->num_rows > 0) {
00039     $file_loc = REPO_BASE_DIR.str_ireplace('/', DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, $file_d['file_dir']).DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.$file_d['file_name'];
00040     if (file_exists($file_loc)) {
00041         header('Content-Disposition: inline; filename="'.basename($file_loc).'"');
00042         header('Content-Type: '.$file_d['mime_type']);
00043         readfile($file_loc);
00044         exit();
00045     } else {
00046         die('<div class="errorBox">File Not Found!</div>');
00047     }
00048 } else {
00049     die('<div class="errorBox">File Not Found!</div>');
00050 }
00051 ?>
